title: Windows LocalTime
body:
by **raistlin77sjw**: 
var tm = time.LocalTime()
var str = tm.Format( "2006|01|02|15|04|05|-0700" );

> 2010|05|03|14|34|10
> 2010|05|03|14|34|10|+0000

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

> GOARCH=386
> GOOS=mingw
> GOROOT=C:\Users\sw\opt\go\

Last Windows Port

The timezone doesn't handeled correctly, I think. 
I expected 2010|05|03|16|34|10 instead of 2010|05|03|14|34|10.
Attachments: 1. testgo.go (285 bytes)
